Mailing Address: c/o Kelty Mental Health Resource CentreMental Health Building, BC Children's Hospital4500 Oak Sq, Room P3-302Vancouver, BC     V6H 3N1
Service Details: - Provides mental health and substance use information, resources, and peer support to children, youth and their families from across BC- Provides peer support to people of all ages with eating disorders- Staff, parent and youth peer support workers who work at the Kelty Centre through a partnership with The F.O.R.C.E. Society for Kids’ Mental Health (Parents in Residence and Youth in Residence), and an Eating Disorders Peer Support Worker provide information, help, and peer support
How to Apply: Please contact us by phone or through email for additional information
Cost: None; all of our services are free of charge
Languages: English ; French ; Chinese - Traditional and Simplified ; Korean ; Punjabi ; Farsi
